resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107292</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107292</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770208185</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Harmonic Series II: Harmonics, Intervals, and Instruments</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Harmonische Serie II: Harmonik, Abstände 
und Instrumente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Série Harmonique II : Harmoniques, 
intervalles, et instruments</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Série Harmonic II: Harmonics, intervalos, e 
instrumentos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Serie Armonica II: Armoniche, intervalli e 
strumenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αρμονική σειρά ΙΙ: Αρμονικές, διαστήματα, και 
όργανα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Serie Armónica II: Armónicos, intervalos, e
instrumentos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The interval between two notes is related to the ratio of the frequencies of the two pitches. A notated harmonic series can show the relationship between frequency and interval. The timbre of an instrument is determined by the relative strengths of the harmonics in each note.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Abstand zwischen zwei Anmerkungen hängt mit 
dem Verhältnis der Frequenzen der zwei Taktabstände zusammen. 
A notated harmonische Serie kann das Verhältnis zwischen 
Frequenz und Abstand zeigen. Das timbre eines Instrumentes wird 
durch die relativen Stärken der Harmonik in jeder Anmerkung 
festgestellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'intervalle entre deux notes est lié au taux des 
fréquences des deux lancements. A notated la série harmonique 
peut montrer le rapport entre la fréquence et l'intervalle. Le 
timbre d'un instrument est déterminé par les forces relatives 
des harmoniques dans chaque note.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O intervalo entre duas notas é relacionado à 
relação das freqüências dos dois passos. A notated a série 
harmonic pode mostrar o relacionamento entre a freqüência e o 
intervalo. O timbre de um instrumento é determinado pelas 
forças relativas dos harmonics em cada nota.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'intervallo fra due note è collegato con il 
rapporto delle frequenze dei due passi. A notated la serie 
armonica può mostrare il rapporto fra frequenza e l'intervallo. 
Il timbre di uno strumento è determinato dalle resistenze 
relative delle armoniche in ogni nota.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το διάστημα μεταξύ δύο σημειώσεων συσχετίζεται με την
αναλογία των συχνοτήτων των δύο πισσών. Το α η αρμονική 
σειρά μπορεί να εμφανίσει τη σχέση μεταξύ της συχνότητας και του
διαστήματος. Η χροιά ενός οργάνου καθορίζεται από τις 
σχετικές δυνάμεις των αρμονικών σε κάθε σημείωση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El intervalo entre dos notas se relaciona con la 
relación de transformación de las frecuencias de las dos echadas. 
A notated serie armónica puede mostrar el lazo entre la 
frecuencia y el intervalo. El timbre de un instrumento es 
determinado por las fuerzas relativas de los armónicos en cada nota.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>author</value>

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>

              <value>provider</value>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107292</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

      <location>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
